item.title: Executing R From Java Using JRI Library
item.description: R is a very powerful language designed for mathematics and statistics. It became one of the best data analysis tools due to its performance and its syntax simplicity. R can import datasets or generate a csv file with 1 line of code. So, It will be very important to use R with one of the most known programming languages : JAVA. Using JRI library, i will show you how to assign variables, run R scripts….
